Project 2

Instructions

  • Press X to translate the mesh in the positive X direction, C for negative X.
  • Press Y to translate the mesh in the positive Y direction, U for negative Y.
  • Press Z to translate the mesh in the positive Z direction, for negative Z.
  • Press R to rotate the mesh around the X direction in its current position, T for the reverse direction.
  • Press F to rotate the mesh around the Y direction in its current position, G for the reverse direction.
  • Press H to rotate the mesh around the Z direction in its current position, J for the reverse direction.
  • Press B to toggle mesh pulsing.
  • Press N to toggle drawing normal vectors.
